item.title: Day 8: Firebase Authentication
item.description: Monday, July 10, 2017 Lecture Videos Morning: Day 8, part 1 Afternoon: Day 8, part 1 Topics Firebase Authentication ‘firebase/auth’ authWithPopup signing in and out handling auth state changes database rules Examples Authentication Firebase isn’t just a real-time database. It can also provide authentication services via email/password, phone, or common third-party services like Github, Facebook, and Google. For Noteherder, we set up authentication via Google. Step 1: Enable Google authentication in Firebase Go to your Firebase console and click on the “Authentication” tab in the “Develop” sidebar, then click on “Sign-in method”.
